jdbcService.sql: update node set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), owner_id = case when :ownerId is null then owner_id else :ownerId end, published_utc = case when :publishedUtc is null then published_utc else :publishedUtc end, verified = case when :verified is null then verified else :verified end, enabled = case when :enabled is null then enabled else :enabled end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, name = case when :name is null then name else :name end, title = case when :title is null then title else :title end, description = case when :description is null then description else :description end, comment = case when :comment is null then comment else :comment end, version = case when :version is null then version else :version end, context = case when :context is null then context else :context end, latitude = case when :latitude is null then latitude else :latitude end, longitude = case when :longitude is null then longitude else :longitude end, language = case when :language is null then language else :language end, assigned_role_id = case when :assignedRoleId is null then assigned_role_id else :assignedRoleId end, component_id = case when :componentId is null then component_id else :componentId end where id = :id
